name: Drop N' Plop
description:
Taking a poo in real life and not sure how to pass the time? Poop even more , but this time on humans. And do so nobly knowing it is the only way to protect your once lush forest that humans keep messing up. 

Eat food powerups and poop even more in action-packed solo-made college-drop-out bonanza entirely coded designed and audio composed by a dude with limited skills and garageband. All tracks are custom made, all sound is my mouth making effects into a laptop, art is credited to the publishers who made the assets.

How long will you poo to protect the earth? How long CAN you?
